## Purpose

The purpose of this project is to provide all districts with as many of the required LCAP metrics as possible. It draws on public datasources including the California Dashboard and CDE's downloadable data files (https://www.cde.ca.gov/ds/sd/sd/). 

## Instructions

1. Select your LEA from the drop down list to the left.  
2. Click on "Download Report" button. 
3. Save the html file in a location you can file. 
4. Open the html file you downloaded in step 3 with Chrome or Firefox. 

## Questions

If you have any questions, please contact David Dobrowski at the Monterey County Office of Education.
